content.chorus:
Hosanna diri Gi Onye nwem,
Hosanna Jerusalem to be Dinwenu
Hosanna
verses:
Tobe Chukwu Nna nke eluigwe Hosanna
N'ihi n'ogosi g'ebube ya
Hosanna

O gbaputara ndi nke ya
Hosanna Aka Ike Yak'O ji zuo ha
Hosanna

0-ruru oru ebube ya
Hosanna Wee gosi
Na so Ya bu Chukwu
Hosanna.

O ziter'anyi Messiah
Hossanna Dinwenu anyi.
Jesu Kristi
Hosanna.

Onye meriri ekwensu
Hosanna Wee gbaputa anyi n'aka ya.
Hosanna.
